titleStmt.title: Vox cleri, or, The sense of the clergy concerning the making of alterations in the established liturgy with remarks on the discourse concerning the Ecclesiastical Commission and several letters for alterations : to which is added an historical account of the whole proceedings of the present convocation.
titleStmt.author: Long, Thomas, 1621-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by R. Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Thomas Long. Cf. DNB.
"An historical account of the present convocation": p. 57-72.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
